file_content.text: We won't forget what you did for us, Master Jedi. My men will let you through the ray shield whenever you're ready to leave.
We'll secure the base and clean up this mess. You should talk to the other Jedi.
That's it--we did it! With the ray shields up, we can hold out until reinforcements get here.
Then we kill our enemies. Yes. Destroy them to the last man.
No... no. That's not... I told you! I shouldn't have done this!
Hang on... we've got movement outside the ray shield. Who is that?
What a mystery the Force can be. I came seeking a traitor, but found you instead. The time draws near.
You're too late. You won't be killing anyone for the Emperor today.
You failed, executioner.
A minor disappointment, eclipsed by this curious discovery.
You're not making any sense. Do you know me, Sith?
The time for what?
Many know your name. Some whisper it, others shout it. I alone recognize what it means.
If you mean the time of your death, I'll have the lieutenant open the ray shield now.
I'm going to kill you.
Reckonings arrive at their own pace. No need to rush them.
You're strong and touched by darkness. That is unexpected. An advantage? Possibly.
You're young, strong, confident. Is it enough? We will see.
You may keep the Dark Council traitor. I smell his weakness. He'll die by his own hand, given the chance.
Sajar will receive the help he needs.
I'll keep him safe.
A waste of your time and talents. He isn't worthy.
What will your master say when you return empty-handed?
What about the Emperor?
I'll bring him news of his most hated enemy. The traitor will be forgotten.
Admit it. You don't want to face me.
I think you fear me.
Arrogant and prideful. Surprising in so many ways.
The Emperor must hear of our meeting. I won't disappoint him with delays. Farewell, for now....
Is it freezing in here, or is that just my blood crystallizing?
So that was the Emperor's Wrath. Fun nickname.
I've seen my share of Sith. That's one you shouldn't face alone.
T7 scans = complete // Emperor's Wrath = Sith physiology + unknown biochemical enhancements // Extreme caution = strongly advised
I don't know what that was all about, but I hope he doesn't come back.
No offense, but that other Jedi's brought us nothing but bad luck. We might be better off if he left.
He's still hiding in his room. Maybe you can talk some sense into him?
My engineers tell me that other Jedi helped them set up the ray shields in half the time. He really came through for us.
He's back in his room, asking to see you. Thank him for me.
That other Jedi seemed pretty upset. Maybe you ought to talk to him while we secure things here?
Imperials are breaching the main doors--hurry!
More enemies coming in! They're everywhere!
The enemy breached our rear defenses! You've got to get back there!
The shields are almost up! We've got to hold the line!
